abstract: If Occupy Wall Street needs a manifesto, they should look to John Rawls and his theory of "justice as fairness."
snippet: If Occupy Wall Street needs a manifesto, they should look to John Rawls and his theory of "justice as fairness."
lead_paragraph: Whether it fizzles with the first snowfall or develops into a true counterweight to the Tea Party, Occupy Wall Street will go down as the first protest movement in recent memory to shine a critical light on the staggering levels of economic inequality in the United States.
